article_title: Obamacare 40% Cadillac Tax Hits No Frills Plans Too. Like Your Plan, Keep Your Plan?

article_metadata.description: Among the worst and most deceptive parts of Obamacare is the grossly mislabeled 'Cadillac tax,' a 40% excise tax on employer coverage that will reshape how employers provide health coverage. Get ready to pay it.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Among the worst and most deceptive parts of Obamacare is the grossly mislabeled 'Cadillac tax,' a 40% excise tax on employer coverage that will reshape how employers provide health coverage. Get ready to pay it.
